Table of Contents

Name

AuGetErrorText - get a description of an error code

Synopsis

#include <audio/audiolib.h>

void AuGetErrorText(server, code, buffer_return, length) AuServer *server;
int code;
char *buffer_return; /* RETURN */
int length;

Arguments

server
Specifies the connection to the audio server.
code
Specifies the error code to obtain a description of.

buffer_return
Returns the error description.

length
Specifies the length of the buffer.

Description

AuGetErrorText copies a NUL-terminated string describing code into buffer_return.

See Also

AuServerName, AuGetErrorDatabaseText, AuSetErrorHandler, AuSetIOErrorHandler, AuSynchronize.

audiolib - Network Audio System C Language Interface
